title: League Displays (Screensavers)
body:
Hi, Riot and fellow summoners

I just downloaded and installed League Displays. I can the wallpapers to work nicely... but the screen savers aren't working. I just get a blank screen and nothing happens. I even used my preview of my screen saver on my computer... and nothing. Please help me!

Thanks, 

{{sticker:katarina-love}}

Edit: I have a new problem with League Displays, the backgrounds. Whenever I turn off my computer and turn it back on, the screen does this: 

https://i.gyazo.com/840cf689b34a849469cf3e3e7e7a000e.jpg

Also, some information I left out, I am on Windows 10.

replies.body: Yeeeaaa that's no good for sure. It looks like the background is *attempting* to show at the top there but is glitching out pretty badly. Hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with any more details you have that might be useful and they should be able to figure this out!

Alright, thank you. I will do this right now. 

(Also, love the icon)
Same! The wallpapers work but not the screensaver! {{champion:134}}  just give me my syndra screensaver!
